name: lightning-talk
description: Show an SVG drawing as slides

scripts.build: browserify index.js | cat build/index.before-style.html build/style.css build/index.before-script.html - build/index.very-end.html > index.html
scripts.test: eslint . && echo "Heads up! Only linting supported at the moment."
